Package nzilbb.elpis

Class Response

  • Object
    • Response
  • public class Response
extends Object
    A class representing the JSON response of an Elpis request.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz

      Getter for httpStatus: The HTTP status code, or -1 if not known.

      Getter for raw: Raw response text.

      • checkForErrors

        public Response checkForErrors()
                        throws ElpisException
